Grad School FAQs

Frequently asked questions by new engineering graduate students at UCLA

What are the best ways to find housing while at UCLA?

There are several options available to graduate students at UCLA. A short list of resources include:

  • University apartments
  • UCLA Off-campus housing system
  • Padmapper
  • UCLA Co-op housing

Where is the eGSA lounge, and how do I get in?

The eGSA lounge 2438 BH, and requires a key-code to enter. This code varies by department, and was distributed at the beginning of your time at UCLA, but you may reacquire it by emailing the lounge manager. For more information you can also view the Resources page

I am applying for jobs, are there resources available on campus to help?

  • Graduate student resource center (GSRC)
  • Graduate student writing center (GSWC)

Where can I go for information on fellowships, internships, or jobs?

The available fellowships and jobs at any given time are constantly in flux. For the most up-to-date information, including cancellations and changes, please register for the Career Center BruinView
